trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示一套<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The StrokeCollection enables you to perform functions such as hit testing, clipping, and erasing strokes.
trans-unit.target: StrokeCollection 使你可以执行如命中测试、 剪辑，以及擦除描边的功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> control performs many of these functions, but if you need more control than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> provides, the StrokeCollection offers more options.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>控件将执行的多数函数，但是如果您需要更多的控制权<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>提供，StrokeCollection 提供更多选项。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists where to learn about managing digital ink on a custom control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了在何处，若要了解有关管理自定义控件上的数字墨迹。

trans-unit.source: |To do this…|See this article| |-----------------|----------------------| |Create a control that collects digital ink|[Creating an Ink Input Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Create a control that enables the user to select ink|[How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Create a control that enables the user to point-erase ink|[How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values |Term|Definition| |----------|----------------| |`isfString`|A string that represents the stroke in base-64, encoded Ink Serialized Format (ISF).|
trans-unit.target: |为此...|请参阅此文章 | |-----------------|----------------------| |创建收集数字墨迹控件 |[创建墨迹输入控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |创建的控件，使用户能够选择墨迹 |[如何︰ 从自定义控件中选择墨迹](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |创建控件，使用户点擦除墨迹 |[How to︰ 清除上一个自定义控件的墨迹](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| # # XAML 属性用法``` ``` # # XAML 对象元素用法``` ``` # # XAML 值 |术语 |定义 | |----------|----------------| |`isfString`|一个字符串，表示的笔划以 base&64; 编码墨迹序列化格式 (ISF)。 |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> class that contains the specified strokes.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>包含指定描边的类。

trans-unit.source: The strokes to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到的笔画<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> from the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> of Ink Serialized Format (ISF).
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>从指定<xref:System.IO.Stream>墨迹序列化格式 (ISF)。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A stream that contains ink data.
trans-unit.target: 包含墨迹数据的流。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified strokes to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将添加到指定的笔画<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Add method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Add 方法引发<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>要添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: A in strokes is already a member of the .
trans-unit.target: A in strokes is already a member of the .

trans-unit.source: strokes is .
trans-unit.target: strokesis .

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom property to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 添加到自定义属性<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The AddPropertyData method enables you to add custom properties to a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: AddPropertyData 方法使您能够将自定义属性添加到一种<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: You can then include extra information with a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以包括以<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>的额外信息

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> to associate with the custom property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>与自定义属性相关联。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The value of the custom property.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性的值。

trans-unit.source: `propertyData` must be of type <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>,<xref:System.Int16>,,<xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal> or an array of these data types, except <xref:System.String>, which is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: `propertyData`类型必须为<xref:System.Char>， <xref:System.Byte>，<xref:System.Int16>、<xref:System.UInt16>， <xref:System.Int32>， <xref:System.UInt32>， <xref:System.Int64>， <xref:System.UInt64>， <xref:System.Single>， <xref:System.Double>， <xref:System.DateTime>， <xref:System.Boolean>， <xref:System.String>，<xref:System.Decimal>或数组的数据类型，除<xref:System.String>，这不允许。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: propertyDataId is an empty .
trans-unit.target: propertyDataId是一个空。

trans-unit.source: -or- propertyData is not one of the allowed data types listed in the section.
trans-unit.target: -propertyData不是中列出的允许的数据类型之一部分。

trans-unit.source: Clears all strokes from the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 清除所有笔画从<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes all strokes in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that are outside the bounds of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> array.
trans-unit.target: 删除所有笔画<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>的位于指定的边界外<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>数组。

trans-unit.source: The Clip method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: 剪辑方法连接中的第一个和最后一个点`lassoPoints`以创建套索。

trans-unit.source: The Clip method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it clips.
trans-unit.target: 剪辑方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>每个事件<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>它剪裁。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that specifies the area to be clipped.
trans-unit.target: 类型的数组<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> ，它指定要剪切的区域。

trans-unit.source: Replaces all strokes that are clipped by the specified rectangle with new strokes that do not extend beyond the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 将由指定矩形并且用未超出指定的矩形的新笔画剪裁的所有笔画都替换。

trans-unit.source: All strokes that are entirely outside the specified rectangle are removed.
trans-unit.target: 完全外部指定的矩形的所有笔画都移除。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the area to be clipped.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> ，它指定要剪切的区域。

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 副本<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Clone method copies each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in the collection and the new <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> references the new strokes.
trans-unit.target: 克隆方法复制每个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>在集合中，新<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>引用新笔画。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一份<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the specified custom property identifier is in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的自定义属性的标识符是否在<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>要在中查找<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified custom property identifier is in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的自定义属性标识符是否在<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Draws the strokes in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 绘制笔画<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> on which to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref>在其上绘制<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes the ink that is within the bounds of the specified area.
trans-unit.target: 移除位于指定区域的边界内的墨迹。

trans-unit.source: The Erase method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: 擦除方法连接中的第一个和最后一个点`lassoPoints`以创建套索。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> might contain new strokes after the Erase method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>调用擦除方法后，可能包含新笔画。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the specified area is through the middle of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the erase method removes that <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> and creates two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果指定的区域是通过中间<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>，擦除方法会移除该<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>并会创建两个新笔画。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The Erase method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it erases.
trans-unit.target: 擦除方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>每个事件<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>它清除。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that specifies the area to be erased.
trans-unit.target: 类型的数组<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>指定要消除的区域。

trans-unit.source: Replaces all strokes that are clipped by the specified rectangle with new strokes that do not enter the bounds of the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 将由指定矩形并且用不要输入指定的矩形的边界的新笔画剪裁的所有笔画都替换。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> might contain new strokes after the Erase method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>调用擦除方法后，可能包含新笔画。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the specified area is through the middle of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the erase method removes that <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> and creates two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果指定的区域是通过中间<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>，擦除方法会移除该<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>并会创建两个新笔画。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: All strokes that are entirely inside the specified rectangle are removed.
trans-unit.target: 位于指定的矩形内完全的所有笔画都移除。

trans-unit.source: The Erase method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it erases.
trans-unit.target: 擦除方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>每个事件<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>它清除。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the area to be erased.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>指定要消除的区域。

trans-unit.source: Replaces all strokes that are clipped by the region created by the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> along the specified path with new Strokes that are not clipped by the region.
trans-unit.target: 将所剪裁的创建由指定的区域的所有笔画都替换<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref>沿不剪切由区域的新描边的指定路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> might contain new strokes after the Erase method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>调用擦除方法后，可能包含新笔画。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `path` intersects the middle of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the erase method removes that <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> and creates two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`path`的中部相交<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>，擦除方法会移除该<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>并会创建两个新笔画。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The Erase method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it erases.
trans-unit.target: 擦除方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>每个事件<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>它清除。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that specifies the path to be erased.
trans-unit.target: 类型的数组<xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> ，它指定要删除的内容的路径。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> that specifies the shape of the eraser.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref>用于指定橡皮擦的形状。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds of the strokes in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回集合中的笔画的边界。

trans-unit.source: The GetBounds method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Rect> that takes the appearance of the rendered <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Rect>采用呈现<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>的外观</xref:System.Windows.Rect>，则返回 GetBounds 方法

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is 10 display independent pixels (DIP) wide, the <xref:System.Windows.Rect> includes the entire width of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>是 10 显示无关的像素 (DIP) 宽，<xref:System.Windows.Rect>包括<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>的整个宽度</xref:System.Windows.Rect></xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that contains the bounds of the strokes in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> ，该字符串包含在笔画的边界<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester"></xref> that hit tests the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> with a lasso (freehand) path.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester"></xref>进行命中测试<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>套索 （画） 路径。

trans-unit.source: The GetIncrementalLassoHitTester method returns an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> that considers a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> to be "hit" when the lasso path surrounds it.
trans-unit.target: GetIncrementalLassoHitTester 方法返回时<xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>，考虑<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>要"命中"时套索路径围绕它。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for implementing features, such as the ability to select a stroke with a lasso tool.
trans-unit.target: 这可用于实现的功能，例如选择使用套索工具笔画的能力。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> uses an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> to implement the lasso selection tool.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>实现套索选择工具。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: The minimum percentage of each <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that must be contained within the lasso for it to be considered hit.
trans-unit.target: 每个最小百分比<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> ，都必须包含在它被视为命中套索内。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester"></xref> that hit tests the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester"> </xref>进行命中测试<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"></xref> that hit tests the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> with an erasing path.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"></xref>进行命中测试<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>通过擦除路径。

trans-unit.source: The GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester method returns an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> that considers a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> to be "hit" when the eraser path intersects it.
trans-unit.target: GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester 方法返回时<xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>，考虑<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>要"命中"时橡皮擦路径相交它。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for implementing features, such as the ability to erase part of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: 这可用于实现的功能，例如擦除的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>的功能

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> uses an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> that specifies the tip of the stylus.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref> ，它指定触笔的笔尖。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"></xref> that hit tests the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"> </xref>进行命中测试<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the custom property associated with the specified <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: 返回与指定<xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid>关联的自定义属性的值

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A> and GetPropertyData methods enable you to add custom properties to a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: The OnStrokesChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate, which is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: OnStrokesChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托，委托是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.target: 替换指定索引处的笔划。

trans-unit.source: The position at which to replace the stroke.
trans-unit.target: 若要替换描边位置。

trans-unit.target: 要替换当前描边的笔画。

trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>在集合更改。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Modifies each of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*> and optionally the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform*> for each stroke in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> according to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 修改每个<> *1> 和 （可选） <> </> *1> 为在每个描边<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>按照指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When `applyToStylusTip` is `true`, the Transform method affects the shape of the stylus tip, as well as the position of the strokes.
trans-unit.target: 当`applyToStylusTip`是`true`，转换方法影响形状的触笔提示，以及笔画的位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you rotate a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> 90 degrees, the strokes move around an axis and the height and width of the strokes appear to be inverted.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果旋转<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>90 度，描边移动轴和的高度和宽度的描边起来好像已经颠倒。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> which specifies the transformation to perform on the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref>它指定要执行的转换<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to apply the transformation to the tip of the stylus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>将转换应用到触笔的笔尖;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
